name: ngx-lightweight-charts
description: Angular wrapper for Trading View lightweight-charts

scripts.release:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && ng build && cd ../dist/ngx-lightweight-charts && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:major: npm version major && ng build && cd ../dist/ngx-lightweight-charts && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && ng build && cd ../dist/ngx-lightweight-charts && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && ng build && cd ../dist/ngx-lightweight-charts && npm publish --tag latest

author: James Robb
